text: Now that Xcode 4 is out and that I am using it, I found that it's not as easy to set up a Python friendly environment.
I liked developing in Xcode 3.2 but now I can't get the new "Scheme" feature configured properly.
As of right now, empty projects seem a bit buggy, but does anybody have any insight on how to set up Xcode 4 to use Python 3.2?
I realize that Xcode isn't the best tool for the such but it's just a nice environment to work in.
By the way, I do not want to use PyObjC.
It seems that nobody has tried this yet with Xcode 4.
